00021 class r9Weights_class{
00022 //------------------------------
00023 // All the weights are saved in this kind of map, where the key is the low edge of the bin,
00024 // and the content (the float) is the bin content of the histogram: the weight
00025 // There is one map of each histogram (for each electron category)
00026   typedef std::map<double, float> r9weight_map_t; // this map corresponds to one histogram
00027   typedef std::map<TString , r9weight_map_t> r9weights_map_t; // map of the histograms
00028 
00029 public:
00030   r9Weights_class(void);
00031   ~r9Weights_class(void);
00032 
00033   void ReadFromFile(std::string filename);
00034

00036                        TString etaElebranchName="etaEle", TString R9ElebranchName="R9Ele",
00037                        TString ptElebranchName="PtEle");
00038 
00039   double GetWeight(double etaEle_, double R9Ele_);
00040   double GetPtWeight(double PtEle_);
00041 private:
00042   TFile *f_r9;
00043 
00044   std::map<TString , r9weight_map_t> r9weights;
00045   //map<int,double> r9weights;
00046   std::map<TString,TH1F *> r9HistMap;
00047 
00048   unsigned int warningCounter;
